Yes MissB is right they did kill Serizawa in the Kihachi Okamoto 
version of the film (I think it's time for me to watch the film 
again for the 5th time)...it is different in the novel and as soon 
as I get done scanning it then you guys can read it...

I used to see "screenshots" and essays on the silent version of the 
film done in a very traditional stage style and I frequently get 
them mixed up (^_^) but yeah the Tatsuya Nakadai version is my 
absolute favorite
